Gatasaññaka Thera：1．Gatasaññaka Thera.-An arahant．In the time of Tissa Buddha he joined the Order at the age of seven，and threw up into the air seven nangaliki-flowers as offering to the Buddha．Eight kappas ago he became king，three times，under the name of Aggisikha．Ap.i.127.



2．Gatasaññaka Thera.-An arahant．He saw the Buddha Siddhattha going through the air，though only his robe was visible to him．The sight filled him with joy and he concentrated his mind thereon．Ap.i.253f.
